title:
Asymptotics of a Gauss hypergeometric function related to moments of
  symmetric square L-functions I
abstract:
We prove an asymptotic formula for a special case of the Gauss hypergeometric
function which arises in explicit formulas for moments of Maass form symmetric
square L-functions. The resulting formula is uniform in several variables,
which is crucial for proving hybrid subconvexity bounds for the L-functions
under consideration.
